text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) zai-org/Open-AutoGLM | 96% | stars now 16837 → est 34952 (range 34871-35033)
   https://github.com/zai-org/Open-AutoGLM
2) productdevbook/port-killer | 94% | stars now 845 → est 7157 (range 7132-7182)
   https://github.com/productdevbook/port-killer
3) eooce/Gla-deploy | 92% | stars now 1083 → est 3738 (range 3713-3763)
   https://github.com/eooce/Gla-deploy
4) gaearon/rscexplorer | 92% | stars now 514 → est 5378 (range 5353-5403)
   https://github.com/gaearon/rscexplorer
5) actionstatelabs/android-action-kernel | 90% | stars now 1116 → est 2894 (range 2869-2919)
   https://github.com/actionstatelabs/android-action-kernel

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
